summary: Yakuza are like Japanese gangsters, part of powerful crime groups. They have unique traditions, like body tattoos and a special finger-cutting ritual. In the past, they were very influential, with many members, but their numbers have dropped. Now, there are fewer young people joining, and most members are older. Despite this, they still cause fear with their criminal activities. The Japanese government is trying to stop their illegal actions.
title: Yakuza
